resources.string: App Created by: Overnight Apps. This app is an unofficial Game of Thrones trivia app. This app has no affiliation with the Game Of Thrones franchise.

Sources used to obtain various content used in this application.
thebacklot.com
goodreads.com
HBO(©)
A Song of Ice and Fire Book Series(©)
Upates in this version: Whole new application.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What are the names of the Brothers of the Night\'s Watch in the prologue?
What is the name of Daenery\'s husband?
Which is not one of the Seven Gods?
Name of the youngest of Tywinn Lannister\'s Children?
At the book\'s beginning, what is the name of the former Lord Commander of the Kingsguard?
In the forging of a Maester\'s chain, which metal indicates study in the field of warcraft?
What is the blazon on the Tarly coat of arms?
Which sword is not made of Valyrian Steel?
Who serves as the High Steward of the Vale?
At what age is Jon Snow when he asks to join the Night\'s Watch?
Which Stark Lord was the last of the Kings in the North?
Game of Thrones is set in the fictional land of Westeros. How many Kingdoms does it have?
Thrones Season One focused primarily on the family of "Ned" Stark. What is his real name?
What is the name of the youngest Stark child?
Who is Joffrey Lannister\'s real father?
In the first episode of the season, a humanoid creature is shown in the snow-covered wilderness. What is this creature known as?
Bran Stark was thrown from a window by whom or what?
Daenarys Targaryen is referred to as "Khaleesi" by the Dothraki. What, literally, does that word mean?
Which of the following characters is NOT dead as we enter Season 2?
Which of the following characters died from molten gold?
How many baby dragons hatch from Daenerys\'s eggs?
What is the first name of Ned Stark\'s late sister, who was married to King Robert before being kidnapped by Rhaegar Targaryen?
What is last name of Ned\'s Bastard son?
What is the name of the actor that plays Ned Stark?
What is the name of the group of people who travel with the Mother of Dragons in season 1?
\"If I look back, I am lost\"
Who is the actress that plays Daenerys?
Who is the actor that plays Tyrion?
What is the name of Tyrion\'s lover?
\"Those are brave men. Let\'s go kill them!\"
\"Crowns do queer things to the heads beneath them.\"
\"A ruler who hides behind paid executioners soon forgets what death is.\"
\"Know the men who follow you and let them know you. Don\'t ask your men to die for a stranger.\"
\"If you would take a manâ€™s life, you owe it to him to look into his eyes and hear his final words. And if you cannot bear to do that, then perhaps the man does not deserve to die.\"
Eddard Stark is the Warden of the ....
How many men went with Ned to rescue Lyanna?
How many known bastard children has Tyrion fathered?
\"Is it so far from madness to wisdom?\"
Which house does Tyrion\'s squire come from?
Where did Eddard Stark and Robert Baratheon become close?
In which episode is Ned beheaded?
What is the name of Eddard\'s Valyrian Steel blade?
Who saves Tyrion\'s life in the battle at the blackgate?
What possession is taken from Daenerys in Qarth?
What is the name of Daenery\'s protecter?
What is the ultimate cause of fricition between Ned and Robert after the rebellion?
Jaime\'s slaying of the king that he vowed to protect
Why was Daenerys and Viserys sent away from Westeros?
To obtain the three dragons eggs
She was one of the heirs to the Mad King
